_json.gridTitle: Rhubarb Butter | From Scratch Healthy Recipe
_json.description: "RHUBARB BUTTER 4 stalks of rhubarb 1 apple, cored and cut into chunks 1/2 cup honey 2 tsp vanilla extract 1/4-1/2 tsp cinnamon Instructions  Puree together the apple and rhubarb until smooth in your food processor or vitamix.  Pour apple/rhubarb mixture into a pot and mix in honey, vanilla and cinnamon.  Bring mixture to a boil, stirring occasionally.  Reduce to simmer and continue to stir every 4-5 minutes or so.  Cook for about 15-20 minutes or until desired consistency is reached."
